articles.title: Supreme Court steps on Senate's generational statement on guns with one of its own

articles.title: Analyst reacts to Supreme Court of the United States strinking down New York gun law - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin discusses the possible implications of the Supreme Court striking down a New York gun law enacted more than a century ago that places restrictions on carrying a concealed handgun outside the home.

articles.title: Senate passes first major federal gun safety legislation in decades
articles.description: The Senate on Thursday night passed a bipartisan bill to address gun violence that amounts to the first major federal gun safety legislation in decades.

articles.title: Justin Ross Harris' ex-wife calls him 'a loving and proud father' who also was 'a terrible husband'
articles.description: Leanna Taylor has long maintained that her ex-husband did not mean to leave their 22-month-old son Cooper to die in the back of a sweltering SUV eight years ago.
